name: Casino Wizard
description: Casino Wizard helps you to calculate your roulette winnings, casino staff most often gets this wrong and you will loose money. The app is designed for speed and to be extremely easy to use, the UI is designed so that entry can be made one handed and fast, allowing you to know the payout before the casino staff has calculated your winnings and you are able to correct them when they are wrong. The app will pay for itself in your first casino visit.
